org.pdfbox.io
Class RandomAccessFileInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      org.pdfbox.io.RandomAccessFileInputStream
public class RandomAccessFileInputStream
extends InputStream

This class allows a section of a RandomAccessFile to be accessed as an input stream.

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $
Author:
Ben Litchfield
